name: Ext_R5_RequestOrchestration_ac_dynamicValue
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.RequestOrchestration.action.dynamicValue for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents RequestOrchestration.action.dynamicValue from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RequestOrchestration|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Customizations that should be applied to the statically defined resource. For example, if the dosage of a medication must be computed based on the patient's weight, a customization would be used to specify an expression that calculated the weight, and the path on the resource that would contain the result.
element.comment: `RequestOrchestration.action.dynamicValue` has no related element in R4B:RequestGroup

element.short: The path to the element to be set dynamically
element.definition: The path to the element to be customized. This is the path on the resource that will hold the result of the calculation defined by the expression. The specified path SHALL be a FHIRPath resolvable on the specified target type of the ActivityDefinition, and SHALL consist only of identifiers, constant indexers, and a restricted subset of functions. The path is allowed to contain qualifiers (.) to traverse sub-elements, as well as indexers ([x]) to traverse multiple-cardinality sub-elements (see the [Simple FHIRPath Profile](https://hl7.org/fhir/fhirpat.html#simple) for full details).
element.comment: `RequestOrchestration.action.dynamicValue` has no related element in R4B:RequestGroup

element.short: The path to the element to be set dynamically
element.definition: The path to the element to be customized. This is the path on the resource that will hold the result of the calculation defined by the expression. The specified path SHALL be a FHIRPath resolvable on the specified target type of the ActivityDefinition, and SHALL consist only of identifiers, constant indexers, and a restricted subset of functions. The path is allowed to contain qualifiers (.) to traverse sub-elements, as well as indexers ([x]) to traverse multiple-cardinality sub-elements (see the [Simple FHIRPath Profile](https://hl7.org/fhir/fhirpat.html#simple) for full details).
element.comment: `RequestOrchestration.action.dynamicValue` has no related element in R4B:RequestGroup

element.short: An expression that provides the dynamic value for the customization
element.definition: An expression specifying the value of the customized element.
element.comment: `RequestOrchestration.action.dynamicValue` has no related element in R4B:RequestGroup

element.definition: An expression specifying the value of the customized element.
